answers.answer: My mom developed eclampsia really bad and also had to have her baby early. Everything was fine and her and the baby were safe and healthy. You will be ok, doctors know what their doing:)

question: So I have preeclampsia and today we found out that it is now superimposed. I am 37 weeks and now my doctor wants to induce me.  So terrified I do not know what to expect. And advice?
title: So terrified!!! Please I need some advice.
